auth.logout_goodbye: Thank you for using the system.

auth.email_not_received: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or contact us.

errors.invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Check your credentials and try again.
errors.email_not_confirmed: Your account has not been activated yet. Check your email and click the activation link.
errors.user_already_exists: A user with this email already exists. Try logging in.
errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.password_too_weak: Password is too weak. Meet all requirements.
errors.password_requirements_not_met: Password does not meet all requirements.
errors.terms_not_accepted: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy.
errors.generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

home.hero_title: Find the best specialist for your pet
home.hero_description: Dietitians, physiotherapists, behaviorists and other professionals in one place, ready to help you and your animal.
home.featured_description: Meet our best-rated professionals who will help your pet enjoy health and well-being.
home.platform_description: PetsFlow connects pet owners with the best specialists in Poland, guaranteeing professional care for your pet.
home.specialist_cta: Join our platform to gain access to new clients and a convenient CRM tool tailored to your practice.

benefits.verified_specialists_desc: We work only with proven professionals with appropriate qualifications and experience.
benefits.experienced_professionals_desc: Find a specialist who knows about the health and welfare of animals of various species.
benefits.easy_appointments_desc: Contact specialists directly and make appointments without intermediaries.

pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan that fits your practice
